name: Tocquigny Advertising & Interactive
tag_list: measured-approach, marketing, advertising, consulting, online, internet, media, seo, design, interactive, social-media, branding
overview:
Tocquigny is a full-service interactive advertising agency, specializing in branding, strategy, advertising design, and social media marketing.

Founded by Yvonne Tocquigny in 1980 as a creative design studio, Tocquigny has steadily grown into a full-service leader in interactive, social, and mobile marketing. Propelled by innovation and hands-on leadership, we’ve rapidly developed competencies that harness the latest marketing trends and techniques.

We serve a broad range of clients located throughout the world. Each benefits from the uncommon breadth of services we provide: from traditional branding and lead generation to the latest in mobile application development.

Tocquigny has been named the â€œNo. 2 Interactive Agency in the Nation” by BtoB magazine and a â€œTop 20 Interactive Agencyâ€ by Adweek.
